Name: Southern Tea
Ingredients: 15 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
15 ml Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur
30 ml Southern/Louisiana-style whisky liqueur (e.g. Southern Comfort)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: Sweet fruity flavours balanced by tannic bitterness in the tea.
History: Created in 2002 by yours truly in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Southern Tea contains 191 calories
